GPUQuerySet.summary: NOTE Experimental The GPUQuerySet interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} is used to record the results of queries on passes, such as occlusion or timestamp queries.

blockquote.para: The timestamp-query feature needs to be enabled to use timestamp queries.

remarks.para: A GPUQuerySet object instance is created using the method.
